import React, { useState } from 'react'
import AddBox from './AddBox/index.js'
import Reminder from './Reminder/index.js'
import { ReminderBox } from './Reminder/styles.js'
import SearchBar from './SearchBar/index.js'
import FormInput from './SearchBar/index.js'

// import COMPONENT from 'FILEPATH'


const App = () => (
  < body >
    <SearchBar placeholder='Search for a reminder' query={"query"} setQuery={"yeah"} />
    {/* I want this div half width and centered */}
    <div style={{
      display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center'
    }}>
      < ReminderBox >
        <Reminder style={{ alignItems: "center" }} text={"test"} />
        <Reminder style={{ alignItems: "center" }} text={"test"} />
        <Reminder style={{ flex: "1000", innerHeight: "1" }} text={"test"} />
        <AddBox />
      </ReminderBox>
    </div >
  </body >
)

export default App
